Name: il Ponte
Review Text: Their lasagna changed my life. And their pizza was amazing too. My friend Andrew said their food left him feeling complete. You guys should deliver to the east of Amsterdam (and to the whole world). Thanks a lot!

Name: il Ponte
Review Text: Although pizza itself is fine, the delivery process is awful. Offering to deliver in 30 minutes, in fact have to wait for one and a half hour. Common problem - the wrong order delivered. …

Name: il Ponte
Review Text: We had great experiences with this place. To counter other reviewers, our salad looked very fresh and delivery took fifteen minutes on a Wednesday night. For the price and the convenience this place is great. I recommend the fries covered in butter cheese and Donner,aka kapsalon. The schwarma calzone was pretty awesome too.

Name: il Ponte
Review Text: Great affordable pizza and other foods. The service is fast and the staff is very friendly and kind. There are a couple of pizza places in the area but I highly recommend this specific one.

Name: il Ponte
Review Text: Ordered with deliveroo and the food never arrived. I called the restaurant after 1 hour of waiting and  they said they are sending it in 15 min. Two hours later still no food and the restaurant doesn't answer the phone.
